title: Winter Twilight
medium: pen and ink and wash on cardboard
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY, until 1953; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, November 1953 until February 14, 1987 [1]; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994. 

Notes:
[1]. Purchased by Mrs. Beal from the exhibition "The Drawings of Charles E. Burchfield," Print Club of Cleveland and Cleveland Museum of Art, November-December 1953 (no. 35.) See Mrs. Beal's annotated copy of the exhibition catalogue and "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 74.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
